title: Talking Dems - Kamala Harris on Embracing Unity in 2020 and Keeping America's Promise to Immigrants
itunes:title: Talking Dems - Kamala Harris on Embracing Unity in 2020 and Keeping America's Promise to Immigrants
description:
California Senator Kamala Harris answers audience members' questions about the 2020 presidential race and the Trump administration's controversial immigration policies.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
